pages.text: The mana arrow is a projectile spell form.$(br)$(t:Raising these values of the form can increase the profit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Growth Needs：$(/t)$(t:Increasing the Range of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range$(/t)$()$(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(t:The force of the functional spell varies with the speed of the mana arrow)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force：change with flight speed$(/t)$()$(t:The range of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range：1.0$(/t)$()$(t:The duration of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration：1.0$(/t)$()$(br2)The range attribute affects the maximum speed value of the mana arrow.
